data.eml:eml: A new, well-preserved genus and species of fossil Glaphyridae (Coleoptera, Scarabaeoidea) from the Mesozoic Yixian Formation of Inner Mongolia, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Zhuo, Nikolajev, Georgiy V., Ren, Dong (2012): A new, well-preserved genus and species of fossil Glaphyridae (Coleoptera, Scarabaeoidea) from the Mesozoic Yixian Formation of Inner Mongolia, China. ZooKeys 241: 67-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.241.3262, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.241.3262
